name: Fantasy Post Simulator
description:
Fantasy post simulator is an immersive game in fantasy setting when you can try yourself in the role of post's employee. Your job is to sort letters and packages to right place to deliver. Reading other people 's letters isn't really good but here you can do this to immerse yourself in fascinating stories. By sending or destroying this stuff you can affect the story lines. So try it and see, whats inside letter packs!

Tested On: Valve index; Oculus Quest (AirLink/Link/VirtualDesctop)

GitHub: https://github.com/Reality-Ctrl/VR-Super-Jam
